      • init

        public abstract void init(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
        BSPJobID jobId,
        TaskAttemptID taskId)
                   throws Exception
        Init will be called within a spawned task, it should be used to initialize the inner structure and fields, e.G. a zookeeper client or an rpc connection to the real sync daemon.
        Specified by:
        init in interface PeerSyncClient
        Throws:
        Exception

        public abstract void register(BSPJobID jobId,
            TaskAttemptID taskId,
            String hostAddress,
            long port)
        Registers a specific task with a its host and port to the sync daemon.
        Specified by:
        register in interface PeerSyncClient
        Parameters:
        jobId - the jobs ID
        taskId - the tasks ID
        hostAddress - the host where the sync server resides
        port - the port where the sync server is up

      • getAllPeerNames

        public abstract String[] getAllPeerNames(BSPJobID jobID)
        Returns all registered tasks within the sync daemon. They have to be ordered ascending by their task id.
        Specified by:
        getAllPeerNames in interface PeerSyncClient
        Parameters:
        jobID - the job ID
        Returns:
        an ordered string array of host:port pairs of all tasks connected to the daemon.

        public abstract void stopServer()
        This stops the sync daemon. Only used in YARN.
        Specified by:
